name: TrenchWarfare
description: Fight n dig to get 3 flags of your enemy first.
author: Bluester16

AutoStart.description: Automatically start the game when the plugin is loaded.

commands.name: /trench
commands.description: Gives all the info on trench warfare.

commands.name: /trenchify
commands.description: Converts all bricks of the selected color to trench.

commands.name: /savemap
commands.description: Saves the map. Also saves the current environment.

args.name: Map name
args.description: Map name. You have to input the mode through it.
